import React, {useState} from 'react'; import {savePayment} from '../actions/cartActions'; import CheckoutSteps from '../components/CheckoutSteps' function PaymentScreen (props) { const [paymentMethod, setPaymentMethod] = useState(''); const submitHandler = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); dispatch(savePayment({paymentMethod})); props.history.push("placeorder") } return

  • Payment

  • setPaymentMethod(e.target.value)}>
}
} export default PaymentScreen;
